teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: The Barefoot Investor
teams.loan_because: We believe everyone can tread their own path.

teams.name: Ron Paul
teams.loan_because: Enabling entrepreneurship is WAY more effective than foreign aid.
teams.description: We are Kiva lenders who are dedicated to Ron Paul and his message of liberty.

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 200 members, has loaned tens of thousands of dollars over the past four years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Team SKJ Jewett
teams.loan_because: We believe in a just future for all
teams.description: A family team to teach and serve

teams.name: Sikh Seva
teams.loan_because: it is our honor to serve
teams.description: Sikhs do Seva (Community Service) and our Seva is not limited to just one religion.  We serve everyone irrespective of faith and religious belief.

teams.name: London
teams.loan_because:
Looking for Team members who want to become more involved in promoting the team and expanding our membership. Contact Richard to join the leadership. 

If each team member posted a link to this team on their favourite social media site we should see a spike in membership.. 520 as at 15th March 2013

teams.name: TrinityGville
teams.loan_because: we want to show God's love in the world by helping reduce poverty
teams.description: people affiliated with Trinity United Methodist Church

teams.name: Geeks
teams.loan_because: We have a commonality with all entrepreneurs when it comes to solving problems and doing things differently.  Sometimes the only thing holding you back are the resources to move forward.
teams.description: Geeks are "a peculiar or otherwise odd person, especially one who is perceived to be overly obsessed with one or more things including those of intellectuality, electronics, gaming, etc."

teams.name: Simpatizantes EQUO
teams.description: Grupo no oficial de gente vinculada con EQUO y que tiene interés en los microcréditos, en particular a través de KIVA.

teams.name: Postcrossing.com
teams.loan_because: We want to support people from all over the world.
teams.description: Postcrossing joins together people that love to exchange postcards with strangers from anywhere in the world.

teams.name: TheDays and friends
teams.loan_because: We believe our lendings make a difference.

teams.name: Swiss Kiva
teams.description: Residents, citizens, and fans of Switzerland with a common interest in supporting the entrepreneurs of the developing world.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.
